I finally have 99% of all the features, but there are a couple of 
obvious things I need to add to my program:

1)internal coding to prevent objects from being placed with parts 
outside map

2)something to keep generators, characters, and player positions from 
overlapping and a safeguard to warn the user if there is no more 
available space with overlapping objects.

One simple solution would to create an array to keep track of 
available spaces, but they could become a problem in scenarios that 
have a very large map. (On the other hand, this could easily become a 
basis for how to implement chain lightning because the problem is 
similiar)

I have decided to drop the whole door/key thing.  A couple of reasons:
1)doors are pretty dependent on team number
2)right now, there is no easy way to move objects around in a scenario 
so randomly placing them is a bad idea.
